channel.title: How to set up: no runes needed at testscape?
channel.description:
Alright, i have a testscape based server. And i want to install, that yo dont need runes to do magic. Which code in the client.java do i need to ''fix'' whit another code?
Hope you can help!

item.title: How to set up: no runes needed at testscape?
item.dc:creator: @Cyclone Cyclone
item.description:
@Cyclone wrote:

Try ctrl f … then type in magic it will say under the spells if player has +item+ +ammount+ or something

Its somert to do with tht sorry i can’t help much tho

Read full topic
item.source: How to set up: no runes needed at testscape?
